specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Embossed Embossed is a fabric finish that creates a 3D effect on the surface using heat or pressure to form patterns or designs. It adds texture and depth, making the fabric more visually rich and stylish Mechanical > Laminated A laminated fabric is a two (or more) layer construction with a polymer film bonded to a fabric. It provides water resistance and wind-proof properties, making it suitable for rainwear, automotive, and other applications.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Mechanical > Laminated The film portion is delicate, and may melt when ironed at high temperatures. Iron at low temperature and avoid direct ironing on the film.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance 4 Way Stretch A 4-way stretch fabric stretches and recovers both width and lengthwise, allowing it to move naturally with the body and return to its original shape. This provides a comfortable, flexible fit, making it especially suitable for activewear. Water Resistant Waterproof is a specially coated fabric that prevents water penetration to a certain degree, though it may not be completely impermeable. This treatment helps protect the wearer or the item from rain and moisture, making it suitable for outerwear, bags, and outdoor gear. Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear, Raincoat
